author: Patch22
title: 41508 Volectro Review.
review:
This is a pretty good set with some great pieces, I thought it looked like a good set to get, considering the price.

Packaging/Instructions

The packaging has Volectro on it, with a Picture of his cartoon version.

The instructions are easy to follow and I can't spot any mistakes in it.The Instructions also have a picture of all the series 1, 2, and 3 Mixels.

Parts

The pieces in this set are pretty good, the pieces used for his fingers and the hinges on his arms are cool, but overall I'd say the best piece in this set is the part used for his hair.

 

The build

The build is quick, but still quite fun and overall for a set of this price, it's pretty cool.

 

The completed model

The complete model is great and has a lot of playability,  although his hair does fall of sometimes.

 

Overall opinion

A great set, with buying for the model it's self or the pieces, I'd definitely recommend it.
